price: 14. Dhadhamiya cadaabkiinna. Kanu waa waxaad degdegsanayseen.
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhūqū fit'natakum hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tastaʿjilūna
